name: BATALJ
description: BATALJ is a fierce online turn-based action strategy game where you face other players in one vs one battles with your own custom-built squad. Skill and smart plays decides who comes out victorious.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64bits-only) Processor: Dualcore CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB or Radeon RX 550 2GB equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
